None.Name: Gifted Bombing Raid
None.Description: Activate to become immobile and begin a destructive bombing raid. Every 5 seconds, unit fires off a bomb that explodes after 3 seconds dealing 120 damage to enemies in a 10m radius, up to 180 in total. Affects ground targets only. Has an exceptionally long range of 40m. While in this state, friendly units within a 15m radius around the caster regenerate 20 life points every second. Lasts until deactivated.
